text: John Arne Semundseth Riise (born 24 September 1980) is a Norwegian professional footballer and coach who plays as a left back and a left midfielder and serves as a player-manager of Toppserien club Avaldsnes. As of the 2020s, he has the record for most games played for the national team.https://snl.no/John_Arne_Riise. SNL.no.
